short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create, update and insert charts within Google Slides and Canva, using data pulled from your dashboarding applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of exporting and importing charts that don’t fit your presentation in Google Slides or Canva? Save hours of work by designing your charts within your presentation’s context.

The Chartbuddy chrome extension allows you to create custom charts in seconds . A screen layover allows you to view and edit your chart in your presentation’s. Toggling between several design applications is something of the past.

Chartbuddy:
✅ Tailored: Your chart fits your presentation
✅ Great appearance: many customization options
✅ Update charts with ease: quickly fetch new data using the update button 
✅ Save time: users build up to 3x faster

Use Chartbuddy to build:
- Line charts
- Clustered Bar charts
- Stacked bar charts

Use Chartbuddy to update:
- Fetch your chart data from Looker to quickly update your chart

Terms:
- Chartbuddy is currently in BETA testing phase and free as long as the BETA phase goes on. Future versions of Chartbuddy may be paid. Any BETA testers and future users are required to accept the terms and conditions. https://chartbuddy.io/policies/terms-condition
- This product comes from Chartbuddy.io, it is not created and/or sold by Google
